data.title: Reservation Road - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of Reservation Road with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
46 Metascore

2007

1 hr 42 mins

Drama, Suspense

R

Watchlist

Where to Watch

A fatal hit-and-run accident shatters the lives of two New England families in this powerful story of anger, revenge and redemption, superbly acted by Joaquin Phoenix, Mark Ruffalo, Jennifer Connelly and Mira Sorvino. Directed by Terry George.
